parts.text:
You are writing EXACTLY ONE SENTENCE for a social media post on Instagram.

TASK: Write a single engaging sentence about our summer collection for Instagram.

YOUR RESPONSE MUST BE:
- EXACTLY ONE SENTENCE (no more, no less)
- Between 60-120 characters
- Include 1-2 relevant emojis
- Sound conversational and authentic
- Be exciting and attention-grabbing
- Focus on the main benefit or feature

EXTREMELY IMPORTANT: Respond with ONLY the one sentence. No explanations, introductions, or anything else.
tell followers about our summer collection
